summary: Apex predator of logistics efficiency: 15-year systems architect who weaponized TMW Suite, PeopleNet, and Python automation to orchestrate 60+ daily bulk shipments with 99% on-time precision. Owns graveyard dispatch—thrives 6 PM-5 AM, 4-on/4-off—eliminating HOS infractions before they spawn. Built custom scheduling engine that slashed fleet downtime 30%; ready to scale the same lethal rigor across William Tank Lines’ 150-truck petroleum armada.

Audited ELD data nightly; zero DOT HOS violations during tenure, 100% roadside-pass rate.

Automated Selenium scripts to scrape PeopleNet API feeds into TMW-format CSV; cut driver-log audit time 40%.
Built JWT-secured data bridge; real-time driver status pushes to dispatch console—no phone lag.
Deployed 24/7 Linux server cluster supporting 99.9% uptime for graveyard operations.
Negotiated 500-carrier network specializing in petroleum-derived chemical hauls; maintained DOT security plan for hazmat loads.
Engineered Excel-based rate matrix; auto-ranked carriers by cost-service index—saved 8¢ per loaded mile.
Nightly reconciliation of 150+ driver logs; flagged HOS violators before dispatch release.
